text: and (he will be) a messenger sent to the children of Israel, (saying) that: I have come to you with a sign from your Fosterer, that I make for you from clay, a figure like that of a bird, then I blow into it, so it becomes a bird by the permission of Allah; and I heal the blind by birth and the leper and I bring to life the dead by Allah's permission and I inform you of that which you eat and that which you store in your houses; in that there is certainly a sign for you if you are believers
